摦字的基本解释

摦
huà
宽。

摦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huà］
［《廣韻》胡化切，去禡，匣。］
洪大，粗大。
[②]［huò］
同“瓠3”。

摦字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　摦； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页450第22
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?胡化切，華去聲。【說文】橫大也。【廣韻】寬也。【左傳·昭二十一年】小者不窕，大者不摦，則和於物，今鍾摦矣。【註】窕細而不滿，摦橫而不入也。或作?。　又【集韻】胡瓜切，音華。義同。

考證：〔【左傳·昭二十一年】小者不窕，大者不摦，則加於物，今鍾摦矣。〕　謹照原文加於物改和於物。
摦字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
摦字的起名意思

暂无。

["Guangyun" Hu Huaqie, go to 禡, box. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji] [Hand Character Department] 　摦; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 450 22
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Hu Huaqie, Hua Qusheng. [Said the text] Hengda also. [Guang Yun] Kuan Ye. [Zuo Twenty-one Years] The small ones don’t slender, the big ones don’t, they are in harmony with the things, today the clock 摦矣. 【Note】Slim but not full, but horizontal but not in. Or for?.　[Jiyun] Courgette cut, sound Hua. The same meaning. Textual research: [[Zuo Zhuan·21 Years of Zhao] The small ones don’t slender, and the big ones don’t squash, then add to the things. 〕 　 I would like to add to the material change and to the material according to the original text.
